amendment.description: Amendments en bloc sought to exempt from the provisions of the bill Federal legislation that establishes minimum labor standards, including prohibiting child labor, establishing a minimum wage, and establishment of minimum standards for occupational safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of two amendments, offered en bloc and printed in the Congressional Record of January 20, 1994 as amendment Nos. 107 and 108, to exempt from the provisions of the bill any legislation to establish national labor standards, prohibit child labor, establish a minimum wage, or establish minimum standards for occupational safety.

action.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendments (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 263 (Roll no. 27).
